options.value: You will need to work with the Request and Response Data mapping
Enable CORS
Enable Payload compression
Enable multiple stages

en.question1: You have a legacy application that works via XML messages. You need to place the application behind the API gateway In order for customers to make API calls. Which of the following would you need to configure?

options.value: Change the VisibilityTime out for each message and then delete the message after processing is completed.
Delete the message and change the visibility timeout.
Process the message . change the visibility timeout. Delete the message
Process the message and delete the message

en.question1: An application needs to make use of an SQS queue for working with messages. An SQS queue has been created with the default settings. The application needs 60 seconds to process each message. Which of the following step need to be carried out by the application. ?

options.value: Add a cross account role
Embed the access keys in the code pipeline process
Define a customer master key In KMS
Create a reference Code Pipeline instance in the other account

en.question1: You have been instructed to use the Code Pipeline service for the Cl/CD automation in your company. options.value: The EBS Volume needs to be reattached again for the instance profile to take effect
You need to restart the instance for the Role settings to take effect
The Environment variables which were set for CLI access are taking priority

en.question2: Your team developed and deployed an application on an EC2 Instance. To test the application, you were given access credentials which also included the rights to write to an S3 bucket. Once the testing was confirmed , an lAM Role was assigned to the Instance. This role only has permissions to read from the bucket. But you notice that the application still has access to write to the 53 bucket. Why is this the case?

options.value: Ensure to create an Integration request
Ensure to enable DAX
Ensure to enable CORS
Enable Binary payloads

en.question1: As a developer you have been told to create an API gateway stage that will directly interact with Dynamo DB tables. Which of the following feature of the API gateway must be used to ensure this requirement can be fulfilled?

options.value: Use the API gateway to call the recursive code.
Use versioning for the recursive function
Avoid using recursive code altogether
Place the recursive function in a separate package

en.question1: You just developed code in AWS(Amazon Web Service) Lambda that makes use of recursive functions. After several invocations, you are beginning to see throttling errors In the metrics. Which of the following should be done to resolve this issue?

options.value: Use the cloud formation deploy command
Use the cloud formation package command
Use the sam deploy command
Use the sam package command

en.question1: You are planning on using the Server less Application model which will be used to deploy a server less application consisting of a Node.js function. Which of the following steps need to be carried out? Choose 2 answers from the options given below?

options.value: You have enabled Encryption on the bucket as well . that Is why the space Is being consumed
Monitoring has been enabled for the bucket
You have enabled CRR on the bucket as well . that is why the space is being consumed
This is the normal behavior since the logs are being delivered to the same bucket

en.question1: As a developer , you have enable server logging on an S3 bucket. You have a simple static web page with CSS pages uploaded to the bucket which Is 1 MB in total size. After a duration of 2 weeks � you come back and see that the size of the bucket has increased to 50MB. Which of the following could be a reason for this?

options.value: Make use of Cognito user pools
Make the application call a Lambda function instead.
There is an issue with the stage defined on the API gateway. hence define a new stage
Enable COPS for the API gateway

options.value: AWS Dynamo DB
Kinesis Data Fire hose

options.value: Amazon Elastic Cache � Red is
Amazon Elastic cache � Mem cached

en.question1: A company is planning on using a cache service for their application. Which of the following should be used for this purpose? An important requirement is that trying to recover data lost in cache is an expensive affair for the company, which they would want to avoid?

options.value: Ensure to create one entire stack from the template
Package the templates together and use the cloud formation deploy command
Look towards breaking the templates into smaller manageable templates
Package the templates together and use the cloud formation package command

en.question1: A company has a cloud formation template that is used to create a huge list of resources. It creates a VPC, subnets, EC2 Instances , Auto scaling Groups, Load Balancers etc. Which of the following should be considered when designing such Cloud formation templates?

options.value: Create an ALIAS with the -routing-config parameter
Create a version with the -routingconfig parameter
Update the ALIAS with the -routingconfig parameter
Update the version with the -routing-config parameter

en.question1: Your application currently points to several Lambda functions in AWS. A change is being made to one of the Lambda functions. You need to ensure that application traffic Is shifted slowly from one Lambda function to the other. Which of the following steps would you carry out?

options.value: AWSSAML
AWS Cognito
AWS Federation
AWS STS with PAM

en.question1: Your company is developing an application that will primarily be used by users on their mobile devices. The users need to have the ability to authenticate themselves via identity providers such as Face book. Which of the following service should be used for user management?

options.value: Use the command aws sts decode-authorization-message
Use the command aws get authorization-message
Use the lAM Policy simulator, enter the error message to get the human read ble format
Use the command aws set authorization-message

Consider using large tables

Strong consistent reads of a maximum of 40 KB per second

Get the AWS(Amazon Web Service) lAM Access keys first
Get the context keys first

Place an SQS queue in front of the database

Read capacity set to 5 for 1 KB reads of data at eventual consistency
Read capacity set to 5 for 4KB reads of data at strong consistency
